ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: those in whose wealth there is a known share
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: In whose wealth a due share is included
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and those in whose wealth there is a known right
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They are those who assign a certain share of their property
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And those in whose wealth exists a recognised right,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And those in whose wealth there is a recognized right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And those in whose wealth there is a fixed portion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: those in whose wealth is a right known
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And in whose wealth there is a right acknowledged
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: those who give a due share of their wealth
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And those in whose riches is a known right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and there is a known share in whose wealth
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And those in whose wealth is a recognised right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And those in whose wealth there is a known right,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who, from their wealth is a known right
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And those in whose wealth is a rightful share.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And those within whose wealth is a known right
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [70:24] and in whose wealth there is an acknowledged due, namely, alms,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And in whose wealth there is a right acknowledged) they acknowledge that there is in their wealth a right other than the prescribed poor-due,
